titleStmt.title: Monumentum Regale or a tombe, erected for that incomparable and glorious monarch, Charles the First, King of Great Britane, France and Ireland, &c. In select elegies, epitaphs, and poems.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

notesStmt.note: In imprint "yeare"; title page ornament is a crown and a skull.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
